mapper.insert: INSERT INTO conversion_ab_log2 (yyyymmdd, ip, order_no, user_id, site_code, price , ab_type, in_hour, direct, before_in_hour, before_direct) VALUES (DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'), #{keyIp}, #{ordCode}, #{advertiserId}, #{siteCode}, #{price} , #{abType}, #{inHour}, #{direct}, #{before_inHour}, #{before_direct})

INSERT INTO ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO (CTGR_HIRNK_SEQ , ADVER_ID , ADVER_CTGR_NM , CTGR_LV , USE_YN , REG_USER_ID) SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT NULL, USERID, CATE1 AS ADVER_CTGR_NM, 1 AS CTGR_LV, 'Y', 'BILLING_BATCH' FROM ( SELECT USERID , CATE1 FROM SHOP_DATA A WHERE NO > ${shopDataNo} - 50000 GROUP BY USERID , CATE1 ) A UNION ALL SELECT NULL, USERID, CATE1, 1, 'Y', 'BILLING_BATCH' FROM ( SELECT USERID , CATE1 FROM MOB_SHOP_DATA WHERE NO > ${mobShopDataNo} - 50000 GROUP BY USERID , CATE1 ) B ) Z WHERE ADVER_CTGR_NM != '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO X WHERE Z.CTGR_LV = X.CTGR_LV AND Z.USERID = X.ADVER_ID AND Z.ADVER_CTGR_NM = X.ADVER_CTGR_NM) ; INSERT INTO ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO (CTGR_HIRNK_SEQ , ADVER_ID , ADVER_CTGR_NM , CTGR_LV , USE_YN , REG_USER_ID) SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT CTGR_SEQ, USERID, CATE2 AS ADVER_CTGR_NM, 2 AS CTGR_LV, 'Y', 'BILLING_BATCH' FROM ( SELECT USERID , CATE2, CTGR_SEQ FROM SHOP_DATA A , ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO B WHERE NO > ${shopDataNo} - 50000 AND CATE2 != '' AND A.USERID = B.ADVER_ID AND A.CATE1 = B.ADVER_CTGR_NM AND B.CTGR_LV = 1 GROUP BY USERID , CATE2, CTGR_SEQ ) A UNION ALL SELECT CTGR_SEQ, USERID, CATE2, 2, 'Y', 'BILLING_BATCH' FROM ( SELECT USERID , CATE2, CTGR_SEQ FROM MOB_SHOP_DATA A , ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO B WHERE NO > ${mobShopDataNo} - 50000 AND CATE2 != '' AND A.USERID = B.ADVER_ID AND A.CATE1 = B.ADVER_CTGR_NM AND B.CTGR_LV = 1 GROUP BY USERID , CATE2, CTGR_SEQ ) B ) Z WHERE ADVER_CTGR_NM != '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADVER_PRDT_CTGR_INFO X WHERE Z.CTGR_LV = X.CTGR_LV AND Z.USERID = X.ADVER_ID AND Z.ADVER_CTGR_NM = X.ADVER_CTGR_NM)
SELECT MAX(shopDataNo) AS shopDataNo , MAX(mobShopDataNo) AS mobShopDataNo FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT NO AS shopDataNo , 0 AS mobShopDataNo FROM SHOP_DATA ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 1) Z UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 AS shopDataNo , NO AS mobShopDataNo FROM MOB_SHOP_DATA ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 1 ) X ) Y
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(shopDataNo) AS shopDataNo , MAX(mobShopDataNo) AS mobShopDataNo FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT NO AS shopDataNo , 0 AS mobShopDataNo FROM SHOP_DATA ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 1) Z UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 AS shopDataNo , NO AS mobShopDataNo FROM MOB_SHOP_DATA ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 1 ) X ) Y
